statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, survey_score FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE survey_score > 4;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, survey_score, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE customer_id = 5 AND survey_score < 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE survey_score > 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date, survey_score FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY survey_score ASC
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 1
SELECT customer_id, AVG(survey_score) AS avg_score FROM CustomerFeedbackSurvey GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_score >= 4
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT survey_date, survey_question, survey_response FROM survey_data WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_rating) FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 25 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_feedbacks > 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY survey_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM SurveyData ORDER BY survey_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(satisfaction_id) AS num_satisfactions FROM CustomerSatisfaction GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_satisfactions > 1 ORDER BY num_satisfactions DESC;
SELECT satisfaction_level, AVG(satisfaction_level) AS avg_satisfaction FROM CustomerSatisfaction GROUP BY satisfaction_level HAVING AVG(satisfaction_level) > 4;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, satisfaction_rating FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, customer_name FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM CustomerDetails;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT survey_date, survey_answer FROM SurveyData ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM CustomerDetails WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN SurveyData ON CustomerFeedback.customer_name = SurveyData.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM service_rating WHERE rating_value > 3 ORDER BY rating_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY COUNT(feedback_id) DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT service_id, AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM service_rating GROUP BY service_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level < 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_level ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1 AND feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_survey WHERE survey_score >= 4 ORDER BY survey_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT service_id, AVG(rating_value) as avg_rating FROM service_rating GROUP BY service_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(satisfaction_id) as satisfaction_count FROM customer_satisfaction GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY satisfaction_count DESC LIMIT 5;
